name: Slaughter The Peasant
description: I am thinking about developing this into something more if people are interested this is just a proof of concept. If i could find a good animator to work on this is could be freaking awesome. Bosses, different enemy types, pick up melee weapons,story based long levels etc. the controls are w,a,s and d for movement click on enemy to shoot it, right click reload. 5 weapons in total so far.
